name: Amazon KF10 eBook File
summary: Learn about .KFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: eBooks may be saved in one of several formats. The format of an eBook downloaded from the Amazon store depends on the device being used to download and read the eBook. It may be saved in the KFX format or in the .MOBI, .AZW, or .AZW3 formats.

To open and view eBooks saved in the KFX format, Amazon provides a Kindle app for Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS. You can also use Calibre, a popular program for managing and opening various eBook formats.
